沐.definition: to bathe; to cleanse; to receive; to be given

沐川.definition: Muchuan county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan

沐川縣.definition: Muchuan county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan

沐浴.definition: to take a bath; to bathe; to immerse

沐浴球.definition: shower puff; bath sponge; bath ball (containing aromas or salts)

沐猴而冠.definition: lit. a monkey wearing a hat (idiom); fig. worthless person in imposing attire

沐雨櫛風.definition: to work unceasingly regardless of the weather (idiom)
